title: Where can I start learning about computers? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what you want to know. Computer architecture (how and why a computer works)? Computer engineering (how to design a computer at the transistor level)? Computer programming? A good place to start is computer architecture. The more detail you understand about that, the easier the other possibilities will be.

Ditch the hardware and learn software and system architecture. SA might seem like Unobtanium, depending on your level of understanding, but persist and you will discover the fun of hacking. Codeschool, Khan academy, to name a few.
